body: Please add #12882 to this PR. I don't think Linux portability will pass w/o it.
There's a bit of a queue for Kokoro since there were a lot of active PRs today, you can test this locally with `./tools/run_tests/run_tests_matrix.py --build_only -f c uv linux`

